name: Elephant Egg
description:
Instructions

WASD or ↑←↓→ to move around

Space Bar or E to pick up or drop off item

Objective

  • Protect the Egg 
  • Match  keys with the chests
  • Avoid being attacked by the Shades
  • Don't fall off the edge of the world

Story

Elandra the Mage transports into a world and finds an egg that might possibly be her real family. 

Every 10 seconds, the grounds of the world shift and get destroyed when pushed out.

Elandra stays in this world to protect the egg until it hatches. 

*NOTE:

You can only pick up one item at a time.

The Shades are after you, not the egg.
